overview: Mr. Neil Z. Auerbach is founder and Managing Partner of Hudson. Formerly, Mr. Auerbach was a Partner at Goldman Sachs & Co. where he was co-founder of the U.S. alternative energy investment business within the Special Situations Group. Mr. Auerbach founded and managed several other businesses at Goldman during his seven year tenure with the firm, supervising over 30 professionals in the U.S. and Europe, and presiding over a $3 Billion balance sheet. Mr. Auerbach worked in the firmâ€™s Debt Capital Markets and Credit Derivatives units before joining the Special Situations Group in December 2003. In alternative energy, Mr. Auerbach supervised all of the investments made by the U.S. alternative energy business during his tenure with the firm.
